metadata.name: THE PULSES WISDOM
metadata.description:
This Art includes physical and digital properties and performs the true function of the heart - to love and to combine incongruous.

I've being created this painting about 6 years. (2016-2022) with handmade canvas, oil and acrylic paint and my own method of stained and sintering colour glass. It can be lit up like a lamp and you can see the pulse alive or something more that just the pulse..))))
